title: Discover the Top 10 Emission Reduction Technology Trends in 2023 - StartUs Insights
summary: This article explores the top 10 emission reduction technology trends in 2023, focusing on startups and scaleups developing solutions in areas like carbon offsetting, AI-powered emission monitoring, electrification, green hydrogen, CCUS, energy efficiency, waste valorization, bio-based fuels, and emission monitoring. It highlights the global distribution of these startups and provides details about 20 promising companies along with their innovative products and processes.

title: McCormick freshens up red-cap business with new look, bottle - FoodNavigator-USA.com
summary: McCormick has redesigned its spice bottles, introducing a more transparent and airtight container made with 50% recycled plastic. This change aims to improve product freshness, attract new consumers, and align with the company's sustainability goals.  The new bottle design also incorporates a focus on clear labeling and ease of organization for consumers.
